definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:UpgradeTemplate</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Press Shift for more information</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The Upgrade Template Item is your</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">gateway to upgrade your very own</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Iron Armor to it's full potential!</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
